A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was great.  Rather than rehashing what we've seen before like in the last one\, the last Jedi made some bold decisions that I think paid off.  This film sought to separate this series from what came before\, which is why I think some people disliked it but I think that is exactly what was needed.  My only complaint was that some of the jokes felt a little out of place for the universe\, but overall I loved the ride this movie took me on
